tossup_question: -   –  The nucleus is enveloped by a net-like array of protein filaments that maintain the shape of the nucleus. What is this array known as?
bonus_question: -   –   Which of the following structures does dynein [dye-neen] travel along?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)Actin filaments
X)Keratin filaments
Y)Myosin filaments
Z)Microtubules
